channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- Ryzen™ 5000 Series Desktop Processor with Radeon™ Graphics “Cezanne”
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- Ryzen™ 5000 Series Desktop Processor with Radeon™ Graphics “Cezanne”

item.title: CVE-2023-20563|2024-08-02T09:05:45.851Z -- amd -- ryzen%E2%84%A2%205000%20series%20desktop%20processor%20with%20radeon%E2%84%A2%20graphics%20%20%E2%80%9Ccezanne%E2%80%9D
item.description: Insufficient protections in System Management Mode (SMM) code may allow an attacker to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2023-20571|2024-08-02T09:05:45.850Z -- amd -- ryzen%E2%84%A2%205000%20series%20desktop%20processor%20with%20radeon%E2%84%A2%20graphics%20%20%E2%80%9Ccezanne%E2%80%9D
item.description: A race condition in System Management Mode (SMM) code may allow an attacker using a compromised user space to leverage CVE-2018-8897 potentially resulting in privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2023-20565|2024-08-02T09:05:45.856Z -- amd -- ryzen%E2%84%A2%205000%20series%20desktop%20processor%20with%20radeon%E2%84%A2%20graphics%20%20%E2%80%9Ccezanne%E2%80%9D
item.description: Insufficient protections in System Management Mode (SMM) code may allow an attacker to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.
